mapper.update: update tm_plan_detail set PLAN_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPETITIONS = #{repetitions,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SETS = #{sets,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_ON = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PLAN_DETAIL_ID = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PLAN_DETAIL_ID, PLAN_ID, VIDEO_ID, REPETITIONS, SETS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_ON from tm_plan_detail

select plan.PLAN_ID,plan.LEVEL,plan.TRAINING_DAY,plan.cost,plan.VOCATION, detail.VIDEO_ID,detail.REPETITIONS,detail.SETS, des.CHN_NAME,rc.THUMBNAIL_URL,rc.VIDEO_URL from tm_plan plan left join tm_plan_detail detail on detail.PLAN_ID=plan.PLAN_ID left join tm_video video on video.VIDEO_ID=detail.VIDEO_ID left join tm_video_rc rc on rc.VIDEO_ID=video.VIDEO_ID and rc.GENDER=(select ifnull(prefer,1) from tm_user where USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) left join tm_video_desc des on des.VIDEO_ID=video.VIDEO_ID where plan.PLAN_ID=#{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by detail.PLAN_DETAIL_ID
